verses.roman:
koṭi netra nāhi dila, sabe dila dui
tāhāte nimeṣa,--kṛṣṇa ki dekhiba muñi

synonyms: koṭi—ten million; netra—eyes; nāhi dila—did not give; sabe—to all; dila—gave; dui—two; tāhāte—in that; nimeṣa—a blink; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; ki—how; dekhiba—shall see; muñi—I.
translation: He has not given millions of eyes to see the beauty of Kṛṣṇa. He has given only two eyes, and even those eyes blink. How then shall I see the lovely face of Kṛṣṇa?
